channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: A Chance Clew
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Scott Campbell)
item.description: When the girl told him that she'd seen the man who'd robbed her, Glidden is certain it is Lord Arkright is The Red Raven. But can he outwit his nemesis this time, or will The Red Raven get the best of the detective?
